alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Somerset; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:44PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Somerset and southwestern Dorchester Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 844 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Taylors Island to near Lexington Park to Piney Point. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Deal Island around 930 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Mount Vernon, Andrews, Crocheron, Dames Quarter, Whitehaven, Wingate and Honga. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
